blogPost.excerpt: Pocket self-care assistant that helps you stay positive and avoid negativity. JOI is a perfect tool for keeping a mood journal in a simple and funny way. Observe the correlation between your mood and activities during the day to see the patterns in your life.
blogPost.body: Pocket self-care assistant that helps you stay positive and avoid negativity. JOI is a perfect tool for keeping a mood journal in a simple and funny way. Observe the correlation between your mood and activities during the day to see the patterns in your life.
blogPost.title: JOI: Mood Tracker & Self-care Journal - A pocket self-care assistant that makes you feel happier
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 袖珍自理助手，帮助你保持积极向上，避免消极情绪。JOI是一款以简单有趣的方式记录心情日记的完美工具。观察你的心情和一天中的活动之间的关联，看看你生活中的模式。
localize.tagline: 口袋里的自理助手，让你更快乐。

localize.description: 袖珍自理助手，幫助你保持積極向上，避免消極情緒。JOI是一款以簡單有趣的方式記錄心情日記的完美工具。觀察你的心情和一天中的活動之間的關聯，看看你生活中的模式。
localize.tagline: 口袋裏的自理助手，讓你更快樂。

previous.excerpt: data analytics company for the music industry and enables users to analyze the acquired data and use them as required. PlayTreks data analytics services can assist in product development, identifying potential market gaps, improve efficiency, extend reach.
previous.title: PlayTreks - Music distribution and cross channel data dashboard

localize.description: 音乐行业的数据分析公司，并使用户能够分析获得的数据，并根据需要使用这些数据。PlayTreks的数据分析服务可以协助产品开发，发现潜在的市场空白，提高效率，扩大影响力。
localize.tagline: 音乐发行和跨渠道数据仪表板

localize.description: 音樂行業的數據分析公司，並使用戶能夠分析獲得的數據，並根據需要使用這些數據。PlayTreks的數據分析服務可以協助產品開發，發現潛在的市場空白，提高效率，擴大影響力。
localize.tagline: 音樂發行和跨渠道數據儀表板

next.excerpt: Color Spark is a Figma plugin that allows designers to apply a colour scheme to their design prototypes in seconds. Focus on your design, make it stunning, and stop wasting time.
next.title: Color Spark - A color scheme plugin for Figma

localize.description: Color Spark是一款Figma插件，它允许设计师在几秒钟内将色彩方案应用到他们的设计原型中。专注于你的设计，让它惊艳，不再浪费时间。
Color Spark是一款Figma插件，它允許設計師在幾秒鐘內將色彩方案應用到他們的設計原型中。專注於你的設計，讓它驚豔，不再浪費時間。
